column1:
Neighborhood: Maplewood Heights
Price: $950,000
Bedrooms: 4
Bathrooms: 3
House Size: 2,500 sqft

Description: Discover luxury living in Maplewood Heights with this stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home. Featuring a modern open floor plan, this residence offers a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a large island perfect for entertaining. The master suite includes a spa-like bathroom and a walk-in closet. Enjoy evenings on the expansive deck overlooking a beautifully landscaped yard. This home combines elegance and comfort in a prime location.

Neighborhood Description: Maplewood Heights is known for its family-friendly atmosphere, excellent schools, and vibrant community events. Enjoy weekend farmers' markets, scenic walking trails, and a variety of dining options. With convenient access to major highways and public transportation, Maplewood Heights is perfect for commuters.

Neighborhood: Sunnyvale
Price: $720,000
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 2
House Size: 1,800 sqft

Description: Step into this delightful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in the heart of Sunnyvale. The bright and airy living room features vaulted ceilings and large windows that let in plenty of natural light. The updated kitchen boasts quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. The master suite offers a private retreat with an en-suite bathroom. The backyard is a private oasis with a covered patio, perfect for outdoor dining and relaxation.

Neighborhood Description: Sunnyvale is a vibrant community with top-rated schools, parks, and recreational facilities. Enjoy the local farmers' market, boutique shops, and a variety of dining options. With its friendly atmosphere and convenient location, Sunnyvale is a great place to call home.

Neighborhood: Riverwood Estates
Price: $1,200,000
Bedrooms: 5
Bathrooms: 4
House Size: 3,200 sqft

Description: Experience luxury living in this exquisite 5-bedroom, 4-bathroom home in Riverwood Estates. The grand foyer leads to a spacious living area with a fireplace and custom built-ins. The gourmet kitchen features high-end appliances, a large island, and a walk-in pantry. The master suite is a true retreat with a spa-like bathroom and a private balcony. The backyard offers a covered patio, outdoor kitchen, and a sparkling pool, perfect for entertaining.

Neighborhood Description: Riverwood Estates is an upscale community with beautifully landscaped streets, private parks, and a clubhouse. Residents enjoy access to top-rated schools, shopping, and dining. With its serene environment and convenient location, Riverwood Estates is the epitome of luxury living.

Neighborhood: Willow Creek
Price: $650,000
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 2.5
House Size: 2,100 sqft

Description: Welcome to this charming 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home in Willow Creek. The open-concept living area features a cozy fireplace and hardwood floors. The kitchen is a chef's dream with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast nook. The master suite includes a walk-in closet and a luxurious bathroom with a soaking tub. The backyard is perfect for entertaining with a large deck and mature trees providing shade and privacy.

Neighborhood Description: Willow Creek is a picturesque community with tree-lined streets, parks, and excellent schools. Enjoy the local shops, cafes, and restaurants, as well as easy access to hiking and biking trails. Willow Creek offers a perfect blend of suburban tranquility and urban convenience.

Neighborhood: Pine Ridge
Price: $780,000
Bedrooms: 4
Bathrooms: 3
House Size: 2,400 sqft

Description: This beautiful 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in Pine Ridge offers a perfect blend of comfort and style. The spacious living room features a fireplace and large windows that provide plenty of natural light. The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances, granite countertops, and a large island. The master suite includes a walk-in closet and a luxurious bathroom. The backyard is an entertainer's dream with a covered patio and a built-in BBQ.

Neighborhood Description: Pine Ridge is a family-friendly community with excellent schools, parks, and recreational facilities. Enjoy the local farmers' market, boutique shops, and a variety of dining options. With its friendly atmosphere and convenient location, Pine Ridge is a great place to call home.
